<button [attr.type]="buttonType"
        [disabled]="disabled"
        class="zlux-button"
        [ngClass]="{ 'zlux-action-button': callToAction, 'light': lightSkin }"
        (click)="onClick.emit($event)">
  <ng-container *ngIf="label; else contentArea">
    {{label}}
  </ng-container>
  <ng-template #contentArea>
    <ng-content></ng-content>
  </ng-template>
</button>
